sections.title: Instructions
sections.markdown:
- Set aside about 5 minutes in a quiet spot.
- Use short phrases; complete sentences are optional.
- If a prompt does not fit, skip it and move on.
- Answer with bullet points or short sentences.

sections.title: Client worksheet
sections.markdown:
### Reflection prompts
- One morning routine step I can keep consistent.
- One evening routine step that helps me reset.
- A reminder or cue I can use.

### Action prompt
- One small step I will take this week: ______

sections.title: Clinician notes
sections.markdown:
- Draft-only, clinician review required.
- Invite the client to share highlights in session and reinforce skill use.
- Use responses to co-create a brief action plan.
- Highlight strengths and reinforce follow-through.
